## ✅ Definition of Done

- [x] At least 2 auth providers implemented (JWT + Local) – see [pkg/auth/providers/jwt.go](pkg/auth/providers/jwt.go) and [pkg/auth/providers/local.go](pkg/auth/providers/local.go)
- [x] RBAC policy engine functional – see [pkg/auth/policies/rbac.go](pkg/auth/policies/rbac.go)
- [x] Token management complete – see [pkg/auth/tokens](pkg/auth/tokens)
- [x] All gRPC services implemented – see [pkg/auth/grpc](pkg/auth/grpc)
- [x] Security middleware implemented – see [pkg/auth/middleware](pkg/auth/middleware)
- [x] Unit tests with 85%+ coverage – see [pkg/auth/security_test.go](pkg/auth/security_test.go)
- [x] Security audit completed
